Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment of sentence affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Southworth, Appellant.
Submitted April 19, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and BarBIERI, JJ.
John J. Duffy, for appellant.
A. Thomas Parke, III, First Assistant District Attorney, and Norman J. Pine, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
October 12, 1971:
